#summary How to get the example running



= Introduction =

There's a gwt example of use. You need a running xmpp server with bosh connection linked to localhost:8181/http-bind (i will change this in the near future)

get the source code.

inside the project folder type:
{{{
mvn gwt:compile
}}}
to compile the sources
and
{{{
mvn jetty:run
}}}
to run the proxy servlet

Point the browser to:
http://localhost:8080/gwt/com.calclab.examplechat.Example/ChatExample.html
